statements: SELECT * FROM food_distribution;
SELECT food_item, quantity FROM food_distribution ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT id, food_item, quantity FROM food_distribution WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT food_item FROM food_distribution WHERE distribution_date > '2021-08-15';
SELECT recipient_id, location FROM food_distribution ORDER BY location ASC, distribution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_distribution WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY distribution_date DESC
SELECT food_item, quantity, location FROM food_distribution WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND distribution_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT food_item, recipient_id FROM food_distribution WHERE location = 'New York' AND distribution_date < '2021-12-01'
SELECT DISTINCT recipient_id, location FROM food_distribution WHERE quantity < 50
SELECT food_item, quantity, distribution_date FROM food_distribution WHERE recipient_id = 'a8a7d66d-2c97-4ef0-a59c-816f05bcaf9c' ORDER BY distribution_date ASC
SELECT * FROM food_distribution_centers
SELECT center_name, location FROM food_distribution_centers WHERE id = 1
SELECT center_name, location FROM food_distribution_centers ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT center_name, location FROM food_distribution_centers WHERE center_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT center_name, location FROM food_distribution_centers LIMIT 3
SELECT center_name, location FROM food_distribution_centers;
SELECT * FROM food_distribution_records WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY distributed_date DESC;

SELECT center_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM food_distribution_centers JOIN food_distribution_records ON food_distribution_centers.id = food_distribution_records.center_id GROUP BY center_name;
SELECT center_name, location FROM food_distribution_centers WHERE location = 'New York' UNION SELECT center_name, location FROM food_distribution_centers WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM food_distribution_centers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoodDistributionCenter;
SELECT name, location FROM FoodDistributionCenter ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, capacity FROM FoodDistributionCenter WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM FoodItem WHERE category = 'Fruits' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT food_center_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM DistributionRecord GROUP BY food_center_id;
SELECT * FROM FoodDistributionCenter ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM FoodDistributionCenter WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT f.name, f.category, d.quantity FROM FoodItem f INNER JOIN DistributionRecord d ON f.id = d.food_item_id;
SELECT d.date_time, f.name, d.quantity FROM DistributionRecord d INNER JOIN FoodItem f ON f.id = d.food_item_id ORDER BY d.date_time DESC;

SELECT f.name AS item_name, d.quantity AS distributed_quantity, c.name AS center_name FROM FoodItem f INNER JOIN DistributionRecord d ON f.id = d.food_item_id INNER JOIN FoodDistributionCenter c ON c.id = d.food_center_id WHERE d.quantity > 10 ORDER BY c.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoodSupplier;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM FoodSupplier WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT center_name, location FROM DistributionCenter ORDER BY center_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM FoodInventory WHERE item_quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, item_name, allocation_quantity FROM FoodSupplier JOIN DistributionAllocation ON FoodSupplier.supplier_id = DistributionAllocation.center_id;
SELECT * FROM FoodSupplier;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM FoodSupplier WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, center_name, location FROM FoodSupplier JOIN DistributionCenter ON supplier_id = center_id ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM FoodInventory WHERE item_quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_quantity DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, item_name, allocation_quantity FROM FoodSupplier JOIN DistributionAllocation ON supplier_id = center_id JOIN FoodInventory ON item_id = item_id WHERE allocation_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, item_name DESC, allocation_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Food_Distribution;
SELECT recipient_name, food_item, quantity FROM Food_Distribution ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, recipient_address, food_item, quantity FROM Food_Distribution WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Food_Distribution WHERE recipient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT recipient_name, food_item, quantity FROM Food_Distribution ORDER BY recipient_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Food_Distribution;
SELECT recipient_name, food_item, quantity FROM Food_Distribution WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT center_name, center_location FROM Food_Distribution_Centers ORDER BY center_location ASC;
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM Food_Items WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT record_id, action, timestamp FROM Food_Distribution_Logs WHERE action = 'UPDATE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
